title.rendered: Valentine’s Gifts + Ladies’ Night Out + Box Mountain

content.rendered:
Valentine’s Day Gift Ideas

With so many titles, both used and new, we’re sure to have something the book lover in your life would appreciate.  Also try an adult coloring book for only $5.97 as well as our fun and clever literary tote bags and pouches. We also sell Gottwals Books gift cards!

 

Looking for more ideas? Try Crazy Aaron’s Thinking Putty®. More than the silly putty you might remember… Thinking Putty can be heat-reactive, magnetic, or glow in the dark!

 

12th Annual Ladies’ Night Out

Mark your calendars for Middle Georgia’s 12th annual Ladies’ Night Out! This event benefits the pro-life adoption ministry Covenant Care Adoptions.

The event will feature Babbie Mason who is a performer, speaker, and author. The event is Thursday, March 23rd, at 7:00 p.m. Visit their website (link below) for more information.

You can pick up your tickets at any Gottwals Books location.

https://www.covenantcareadoptions.com/event/ladies-night-babbie-mason/

 

Warehouse Update

The boxes are piling high as we unload thousands of books onto the shelves at our new headquarters! We also have all the offices framed, the electricians are busy, and the sheetrock will be going up soon. We look forward to a grand unveiling within the next few months.

excerpt.rendered: With so many titles, both used and new, we’re sure to have something the book lover in your life would appreciate. Also try an adult coloring book for only $5.97 as well as our fun and clever literary tote bags and pouches.
